name: unreminiscent
content:
not unreminiscent of someone/something
Add to word list
Add to word list
similar to or making you think of someone or something, in some way: The fantastic setting is not unreminiscent of certain Gothic novels.
More examplesFewer examplesThe book is not unreminiscent of Condillac's philosophical account of the sensations. This moment is not altogether unreminiscent of the beginning of Samuel Johnson's poem. He has approached the task with an impressive caution not unreminiscent of his illustrious predecessor.
